title: Aditi pagal he
description: Chatpdf allows to chat with your pdf documents. Built with langchain, Mistral LLM, and Chroma Vector DB. It has the capability to chat with your pdfs, and also to search for specific content in the pdfs. It also has the capability to chat with multiple pdfs. It is a web application, and it is built with Streamlit, and it is deployed on Netlify.

title: Language Model for Code-Related Work (LLM)
description: Fine-tuned a very small LLM T5 (770M parameters only) on a GPT-generated dataset (CodeAlpaca) using Supervised Finetuning (SFT). Later, the SFT-tuned model is re-tuned using RLHF (Reinforcement learning from human feedback) using our own Human Preferences, resulting in 19.5 Pass@1 and 44.2 Pass@100 on the HumanEval benchmark.

title: text2sql: SQL Query Generator from Natural Language Queries
description: Trained a Transformers (encoder-decoder) architecture-based model on the CoSQL dataset from scratch for converting Natural Language Queries to SQL queries.
